name: Crunchy Cabbage Salad
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons or more white or red wine vinegar
1/4 teaspoon minced garlic, or more to taste
2 celery stalks preferably from the heart, chopped
1 red or yellow bell pepper, cored, seeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine vinegar, oil, garlic, a large pinch of salt and a smaller one of pepper in a salad bowl. Beat with a fork until combined.
Add the vegetables, sprinkle lightly with more salt and pepper, and toss. Taste and adjust seasoning, and serve immediately.
